text: Shikarpur district () is a district in the Sindh province of Pakistan. The city of Shikarpur is the capital. ==Political Divisions== Shikarpur has 4 tehsils, as listed below: * Garhi Yaseen Tehsil * Khan Pur Tehsil * Lakhi Tehsil * Shikarpur Tehsil Category:Districts of Sindh
title: Shikarpur District
